PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Supreme safety film
CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, National Edition, July 11, 1942, pg. 13, reads: "Mrs. Lottie Eckstine of Pittsburgh, Pa., and her daughter-in-law, Mrs. Billy Eckstine, attractive wife of the celebrated singer, Billy Eckstine, sensation of Earl Hines' take time out with their beautiful dog for the Pittsburgh Courier " Double V" campaign, which is sweeping the nation. The "Double V" song "Yankee Doodle Tan," is being featured by Billy Eckstine on his present tour." -- Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Lottie Eckstine and June Eckstine seated on floral sofa with dog
